/usr/bin/c++    -Wnon-virtual-dtor -msse3 -fopenmp -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -m64 -g -fstack-protector-all   -Wl,--no-undefined CMakeFiles/geogram_demo_Evert.dir/generateGeometry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/geogram_demo_Evert.dir/main.cpp.o  -o ../../../bin/geogram_demo_Evert  -L/home/levy/Programming/Vorpaline/trunk/lib -rdynamic ../../../lib/libgeogram_gfx.so.1.3.4 ../../../lib/libgeogram.so.1.3.4 -lglfw -lGLU -lGL -lX11 -ldl -lXxf86vm -lXrandr -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXi -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/levy/Programming/Vorpaline/trunk/lib:
